name: Buck Rogers: Matrix Cubed
description:
Buck Rogers: Matrix Cubed is a RPG game developed by Strategic Simulations. It was originally released in 1992. It was published by Strategic Simulations. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Buck Rogers: Matrix Cubed on Commodore / Amiga and PC.
Glen Cureton and Tony Van produced the game. It was directed by Graeme Bayless and Victor Penman. It was scored by George Alistair Sanger.
